>
[Ally's Shelter](/Feats.aspx?ID=5618) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fortune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=612" />
<trait label="Kobold" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=759" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 22 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Frequency**
once per day

**Trigger**
You attempt a saving throw while adjacent to one or more allies, but you haven't rolled yet.

</column>

---

You follow your allies' example. Roll the save using an adjacent ally's modifier for that type of saving throw instead of your own.
name: Ally's Shelter
